mapper.insert: insert into user (nickname, login_id, password, email, user_state, role, created_at) values (#{nickname}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{userState}, #{role}, NOW())
insert into queue (user_id, matching_state, start_time, matched_time) values (#{userId}, #{queueState}, NOW(), null)
mapper.update: UPDATE queue SET matching_state = 2, matched_time = NOW() WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM queue ORDER BY id LIMIT 2) AS subquery)
mapper.delete: delete from queue where id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM queue ORDER BY id LIMIT 2) AS subquery) AND matching_state = 2
mapper.insert: insert into chatting_room (user1_id, user1_state, user2_id, user2_state, matching_time, last_chat) values (#{user1Id}, #{user1State}, #{user2Id}, #{user2State}, NOW(), null)
update chatting_room set last_chat_id = lastChatId where id lastChatId = (select max(id) from messages where chat_id = #{chatId})
